mb_compressor.name: Multiband Compressor
mb_compressor.description:
This plugin performs multiband compression of input signsl. Flexible sidechain
control configuration provided. As opposite to most available multiband
compressors, this compressor provides numerous special functions: 'modern'
operating mode, 'Sidechain boost', 'Lookahead' option and up to 8 frequency
bands for processing.
